value.string:
computer = state_change['object']
 portal = computer.getPortalObject()
 
 # reference = computer.getReference("")
 # if not reference:
 # computer.edit(reference=portal.portal_ids.generateNewId(
 # id_group='slap_computer_reference',
 # id_generator='mysql_non_continuous_increasing'))
 
 # Access internal packing list module
 internal_packing_list_id = portal.getDefaultModuleId(portal_type='Internal Packing List')
 internal_packing_list_module = portal.restrictedTraverse(internal_packing_list_id)
 # Create the IPL
 internal_packing_list = internal_packing_list_module.newContent(
 portal_type='Internal Packing List',
 )
 # User has to access his person profile
 person_value = portal.ERP5Site_getAuthenticatedMemberPersonValue()
 # Edit IPL data
 internal_packing_list.edit(
 start_date=DateTime(),
 source_administration_value=person_value,
 destination_value=person_value,
 destination_section_value=person_value,
 )
 
 # Access service
 service_module_id = portal.getDefaultModuleId(portal_type='Service')
 service_module = portal.restrictedTraverse(service_module_id)
 service_value = service_module.restrictedTraverse('computer_registration')
 # Edit line
 internal_packing_list_line = internal_packing_list.newContent(
 portal_type='Internal Packing List Line',
 resource_value=service_value,
 quantity=1,
 aggregate_value=computer,
 )
 
 # Deliver IPL
 internal_packing_list.portal_workflow.doActionFor(internal_packing_list, 'confirm_action')
 internal_packing_list.portal_workflow.doActionFor(internal_packing_list, 'stop_action')
 
 internal_packing_list.startBuilding()
 
 computer.createComputerRegistration(internal_packing_list_url=internal_packing_list.getRelativeUrl())
